CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Service_Provider_Address_Line_1__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Service_Provider_City__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Service_Provider_State__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Service_Provider_Zip__c)), (Service_Provider_Address_Line_1__c & BR() & Service_Provider_City__c & ", " & Service_Provider_State__c & " " & Service_Provider_Zip__c),'')
CustomField.label: Service Provider Address
